price: 30. Hubaal, Arrinkaa waxaa ku sugan calaamooyin, waxaana nahay kuwa wax imtixaama.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَٰتٖ وَإِن كُنَّا لَمُبۡتَلِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyātin wa-in kunnā lamub'talīna
